com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KLightProjectiveBuilderType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KLightProjectiveWithoutShadowBuilderType, KLightProjectiveWithoutShadowDiffuseOnlyBuilderType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowBasicBuilderType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowBasicDiffuseOnlyBuilderType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceBuilderType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceDiffuseOnlyBuilderType

    public interface KLightProjectiveBuilderType
    The type of mutable builders for projective lights.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyFromProjective(KLightProjectiveType k)
      Set all values in the builder to those in the given existing light.
      void setColor(com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<RSpaceRGBType> color)
      Set the color of the light.
      void setFalloff(float exponent)
      Set the falloff exponent.

      Set the intensity of the light.

      Set the orientation of the light.
      void setPosition(com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<RSpaceWorldType> position)
      Set the position in world-space of the light.
      void setProjection(KProjectionType projection)
      Set the projection of the light.

      Set the range of the light.

    • Method Detail

      • copyFromProjective

        void copyFromProjective(KLightProjectiveType k)

        Set all values in the builder to those in the given existing light.

        Parameters:
        k - The light

      • setColor

        void setColor(com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<RSpaceRGBType> color)

        Set the color of the light.

        The default color is full-intensity white.

        Parameters:
        color - The color.

      • setFalloff

        void setFalloff(float exponent)

        Set the falloff exponent.

        The default exponent is 1.0 (linear falloff).

        Parameters:
        exponent - The exponent.

      • setIntensity

        void setIntensity(float intensity)

        Set the intensity of the light.

        The default intensity is 1.0.

        Parameters:
        intensity - The intensity.

      • setOrientation

        void setOrientation(com.io7m.jtensors.QuaternionI4F orientation)

        Set the orientation of the light.

        The default orientation is (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0).

        Parameters:
        orientation - The orientation.

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<RSpaceWorldType> position)

        Set the position in world-space of the light.

        The default position is (0.0, 0.0, 0.0).

        Parameters:
        position - The position.

      • setProjection

        void setProjection(KProjectionType projection)

        Set the projection of the light.

        Parameters:
        projection - The projection.

      • setRange

        void setRange(float range)

        Set the range of the light.

        The default range is 8.0.

        Parameters:
        range - The range.

      • setTexture

        void setTexture(com.io7m.jcanephora.Texture2DStaticUsableType texture)

        Set the texture for the light.

        There is no default texture; this parameter is required to be set.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture.
